products.name: iPhone 13
products.description: iPhone 13. The most advanced dual camera system in iPhone ever. The dizzyingly fast A15 Bionic chip. Big jump in battery life. Durable construction. Super fast 5G. And a brighter Super Retina XDR display.

products.name: iPhone 15 Pro
products.description: iPhone 15 Pro. Made of titanium and equipped with the breakthrough A17 Pro chip, a customizable Action button and a more versatile Pro camera system.
